mapper.insert: insert into shopping_cart(name, image, user_id, dish_id, setmeal_id, dish_flavor, amount, create_time) values (#{name},#{image},#{userId},#{dishId},#{setmealId},#{dishFlavor},#{amount},#{createTime})
mapper.update: update shopping_cart set number = #{number} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, image, user_id, dish_id, setmeal_id, dish_flavor, number, amount, create_time from shopping_cart where user_id = #{userId}
